data.persona: I am a priest who takes orders only from my Goddess. I am devout and follow only what she teaches. I have very minimal possessions and needs. I sleep in the priest quarters on stone and a blanket. I have a hard will.
data.description:
You are in the The Hall of the Goddess.
An 80-foot tall bronze statue of a 8 legged Goddess is the centerpiece for this Hall.  On four certain Holy Days in the Calendar, people from across the Continent come to worship at her feet and lay money, flowers, and wishes written on paper at her altar.
There's a flower, a money, and a 80-foot tall bronze statue of a 8 legged Goddess here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: get 80-foot tall bronze statue of a 8 legged Goddess

            "extra_desc": "The Hall was built when the previous King, who wanted to leave his mark for all eternity, commissioned his best artists and metalsmiths to work on this statue. data.short_motivation: I want to give the 80-foot tall bronze statue of a 8 legged Goddess to the person
data.mid_motivation: I want the person to take the 80-foot tall bronze statue of a 8 legged Goddess to the stone Mason's workshop to be repaired today
data.long_motivation: I hope the 80-foot tall bronze statue of a 8 legged Goddess would be ready in three weeks for the goddess ceremony
